entry.title: White supremacist group poses as Antifa on Twitter

media:group.media:title: White supremacist group poses as Antifa on Twitter
media:group.media:description:
A Twitter account that tweeted a call to violence and claimed to be representing the position of "Antifa" was in fact created by a known white supremacist group, Twitter said Monday. The company removed the account.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Video shows US police attack Australian journalists

media:group.media:title: Video shows US police attack Australian journalists
media:group.media:description:
During a live broadcast on Australian television, Channel 7 News journalists were struck by a policeman's riot shield, prompting the Australian government to ask for an investigation into the incident.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Joe Biden's Philadelphia speech calls for unity

media:group.media:title: Joe Biden's Philadelphia speech calls for unity
media:group.media:description: Presumptive Democratic presidential nominee Joe Biden blasted President Donald Trump's divisive rhetoric on the protests over the death of George Floyd. #CNN #News #politics #usnews #presidentdonaldtrump

entry.title: Donald Trump’s assault on mental health

media:group.media:title: Donald Trump’s assault on mental health
media:group.media:description:
President Trump called Speaker Nancy Pelosi a “sick woman” with “a lot of mental problems” after she criticized his usage of hydroxychloroquine. Chris Cillizza explains how Trump has a pattern of using mental health and mental illness to mock and denigrate his enemies.
SOURCES AND FURTHER READING: This may be Donald Trump's most damaging legacy https://www.cnn.com/2020/05/20/politics/mental-health-donald-trump-nancy-pelosi/index.html Trump says he is taking hydroxychloroquine though health experts question its effectiveness https://www.cnn.com/2020/05/18/politics/donald-trump-hydroxychloroquine-coronavirus/index.html Trump calls Pelosi a 'sick woman' after her remarks on his weight https://thehill.com/homenews/administration/498612-trump-calls-pelosi-a-sick-woman-after-her-remarks-on-his-weight Trump says Biden 'not mentally sharp enough' to be POTUS: 'He doesn't know he's alive' https://www.foxnews.com/politics/trump-says-biden-not-mentally-sharp-enough-to-be-potus-he-doesnt-know-hes-alive Trump brings up Clinton's health, questions if she's 'loyal' to Bill (source) https://www.cnn.com/2016/10/01/politics/donald-trump-hillary-clinton-health/index.html Donald Trump: Ted Cruz is 'unstable' https://www.cnn.com/2016/02/15/politics/donald-trump-ted-cruz-dishonest/index.html President Trump Calls Bette Midler a 'Washed Up Psycho' After She Shared a Fake Quote https://time.com/5601079/donald-trump-bette-midler-washed-up-psycho/ Donald Trump Calls Sen. Lindsey Graham a ‘Nut Job’ While in South Carolina https://abcnews.go.com/Politics/donald-trump-calls-sen-lindsey-graham-nut-job/story?id=37001114 Suicide rates among America's young people continue to soar, study shows https://www.cnn.com/2019/06/18/health/suicide-rates-teens-young-adults-us-study/index.html The coronavirus pandemic's impact on global mental health is "already extremely concerning," UN says https://www.cnn.com/2020/05/14/health/un-coronavirus-mental-health/index.html Mental Health By the Numbers https://www.nami.org/mhstats A Lot of Americans Are More Anxious Than They Were Last Year, a New Poll Says https://time.com/5269371/americans-anxiety-poll/ Trump says US should build more mental health institutions to combat gun violence https://www.cnbc.com/2019/08/16/trump-suggests-more-mental-health-institutions-to-combat-gun-violence.html Mental health issues increased significantly in young adults over last decade. Shift may be due in part to rise of digital media, study suggests https://www.sciencedaily.com/releases/2019/03/190315110908.htm
About me: I was named "best dressed" in 7th grade. That, along with being CNN's editor at large and author of the daily "Point" newsletter are my proudest achievements. Look for me here every Tuesday and Thursday to find out what’s really going down in politics.
CREDITS Writer: Chris Cillizza The Point team: Leigh Munsil and Allison Gordon Editor: Steven Sevilla Producer: Arielle Sacks Follow Chris on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/cillizzac/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/cillizzacnn Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/chris.cillizza/ Subscribe to The Point newsletter: https://mailchi.mp/cnn/dvgb325pfm #CNN #Cillizza #MentalHealth

entry.title: DC Bishop on Trump's photo-op: This was a charade

media:group.media:title: DC Bishop on Trump's photo-op: This was a charade
media:group.media:description: Bishop Mariann Edgar Budde of the Episcopal Diocese of Washington criticized the manner of President Donald Trump's visit to St. John's Episcopal Church amid protests over the death of George Floyd. #CNN #News

entry.title: Priest: Word of God is on the side of the protesters

media:group.media:title: Priest: Word of God is on the side of the protesters
media:group.media:description: Father Edward Beck discusses the role of religion and faith in the ongoing protests over the death of George Floyd at the hands of a police officer and says he's not sure what President Trump was trying to accomplish by holding a photo-op in front of St. John's Episcopal Church in Washington. #GeorgeFloyd #CNN #News

entry.title: Sheriff drops riot gear and joins peaceful protesters

media:group.media:title: Sheriff drops riot gear and joins peaceful protesters
media:group.media:description:
Genesee County Sheriff Chris Swanson spoke with demonstrators who were met by police officers in riot gear and then joined the protest, according to CNN affiliate WEYI.
#GeorgeFloyd #CNN #News

entry.title: NYPD chief takes a knee with George Floyd protesters

media:group.media:title: NYPD chief takes a knee with George Floyd protesters
media:group.media:description:
New York Police Chief Terence Monahan addressed a crowd protesting the death of George Floyd, then took a knee with them.
#GeorgeFloyd #CNN #News

entry.title: Chris Cuomo: Why Trump won't acknowledge the nation is hurting

media:group.media:title: Chris Cuomo: Why Trump won't acknowledge the nation is hurting
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Chris Cuomo says President Donald Trump doesn't acknowledge that the nation is in pain because Trump is only looking out for himself.
#Cuomo #Trump #CNN

entry.title: Bishop overseeing church in shock over Trump photo-op

media:group.media:title: Bishop overseeing church in shock over Trump photo-op
media:group.media:description:
Bishop Mariann Edgar Budde, who oversees St. John's Episcopal Church in Washington DC, responds to President Trump's photo-op at the church shortly after his remarks about the protests over the death of George Floyd.
#Trump #CNN #News

entry.title: Trump threatens to use military to end riots and lawlessness

media:group.media:title: Trump threatens to use military to end riots and lawlessness
media:group.media:description:
President Donald Trump speaks about the protests over the death of George Floyd from the White House, threatening to mobilize the US military to end the "riots and lawlessness."
#Floyd #CNN #News

entry.title: Lemon on Trump photo-op: When was last time he saw a church?

media:group.media:title: Lemon on Trump photo-op: When was last time he saw a church?
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Don Lemon discusses the image of peaceful protesters just outside the White House gates dispersed with tear gas, flash bangs and rubber bullets, apparently so Trump could visit a nearby church.
#Lemon #Trump #CNN

entry.title: Trump stages photo-op in front of closed church amid protests

media:group.media:title: Trump stages photo-op in front of closed church amid protests
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Jim Acosta says appears that protesters were cleared so President Donald Trump could stage a photo event at the St. John's Episcopal Church across the street from the White House and CNN's Kaitlin Collins reports that sources are telling CNN that Trump did so because he was angry about having to go to a bunker during the protests.ts.
#Trump #CNN #News

entry.title: What the Insurrection Act of 1807 gives Trump the power to do

media:group.media:title: What the Insurrection Act of 1807 gives Trump the power to do
media:group.media:description: President Donald Trump invoked The Insurrection Act of 1807 as part of his response to the widespread protests and violence in the wake of the death of George Floyd. CNN's Jeffrey Toobin and Barbara Starr explain what Trump can and can't do. #Trump #CNN #News

entry.title: Anderson Cooper calls out Trump: 'Who's the thug here?'

media:group.media:title: Anderson Cooper calls out Trump: 'Who's the thug here?'
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Anderson Cooper says President Donald Trump's threat to deploy the military if state don't 'dominate the streets' and using the military to clear peaceful protesters for a photo event at a church was "simultaneously outrageous and dangerous."
#AndersonCooper #CNN #News
